name: Lane's Me
body: I've been a creative (+geek) for over twelve years. Recently, I've focused entirely on Javascript to work with Node.js, as well as game, mobile, web, and app development. This has lead me to completely tearing down my *AMP stack so I can now work purely in Javascript, both on the client and server side with Node. I <3 Mac's, iOS and Linux. My most used apps are Illustrator, SketchBook, Photoshop, Chrome, TextMate, and Terminal. I don't FTP; I Git, so SSH. I believe DnB and Dubstep create a better world. I'm an ENFP.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
